title: Restaurant Row - One Bedroom Flat
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   This West Loop timber loft has a wonderfully contemporary look with white-washed timber beams and walls, plus dark hardwood floors. The 11' ceilings, a large wall of windows, and open concept give the space a cool edgy look that today's buyers are looking for! Sliding opaque doors separate the sitting room/den from the master, plus white roll-up garage door closets provide a fun and functional industrial look. The entry and kitchen floor has a black and white vintage hexagon tile design. The kitchen vintage tile floor complements the stainless steel /glass kitchen cabinet design and dark stone counters plus subway tile backsplash to ceiling. The vintage theme also carries into the bath with subway tile surround, glass seamless shower, plus Carrera tile marble floors, unique vanity, and a mirror. A stackable washer/dryer has been added to the unit. Additional coin laundry on the 4th floor. Cable/WIFI included in assessments. Great-West Loop location near Mary Barteleme Park /dog park, some of the city's most sought-after restaurants, boutiques and so much more!  The 30-dollar application fee is waived if the credit score is presented during the showing.
